Interrupts.Name: Bounce
Interrupts.Trigger: This hob or an adjacent ally takes damage from an adjacent foe.

Actions.Name: Pummel
Actions.Effects: Attack target is dazed. Dazed foes take bonus damage.
Actions.Charge: All foes in range 2 also take [fray] damage.

Actions.Name: Stone Toss
Actions.Effects: A foe in range 3 takes 2 damage and is shoved 1, then create a height 1 boulder object next to them.

Actions.Name: Twist Leg
Actions.Description: A foe in range 3 is marked.
Actions.Mark: While marked, each time that foe is shoved or gains a new status, they take 2 damage. A foe can end this mark by not moving for their entire turn.

Actions.Name: Seismic Slam
Actions.Description: The Hob ends its turn and gains
Actions.Delay: it's next turn must be slow. At the start of that turn, all adjacent foes must save or take 2[D]+[fray] and be shoved 1, or [D]+[fray] on a successful save.

Actions.Name: Seismic Slam
Actions.Description: The Hob ends its turn and gains
Actions.Delay: it's next turn must be slow. At the start of that turn, all adjacent foes must save or take 2[D]+[fray] and be shoved 1, or [D]+[fray] on a successful save. Deals bonus damage for every object adjacent to the hob.

Actions.Name: Seismic Slam
Actions.Description: The Hob ends its turn and gains
Actions.Delay: it's next turn must be slow. At the start of that turn, all foes in range 2 must save or take 2[D]+[fray] and be shoved 1, or [D]+[fray] on a successful save. Deals bonus damage for every object in range 2 of the hob.
